channel.title: Can this be done
channel.description: I'm making the website for my server. In-game, can i zoom out to get a good screenshot of my home any way? I'm running a 718 server + Client. I'm looking for maby like a gfx, or interface that does this, all ideas are welcome!!

item.title: Can this be done
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

If you want a live view of you game on your website, good luck. Not quite sure what you are trying to accomplish in this. I know in 317 there is a packet that you can use to “scroll around” your map. Not sure in 718 though.

Read full topic

item.title: Can this be done
item.dc:creator: @Limnic Limnic
item.description:
@Limnic wrote:

If I remember correctly the orb of oculus can do this. However this is most likely not implemented so you will have to find the interfaces and configurations (it has keyboard controls you have to handle) by yourself.

You could also try configuring a cinematic scene however I only know the methods for this exist in 718.

Read full topic
